thread.title: Congress Returns to Washington Under Pressure to Act on Guns

author: Kristina Peterson
title: Congress Returns to Washington Under Pressure to Act on Guns
text:
WASHINGTON—Lawmakers plan to take a fresh look at a stalled effort to tighten the national firearm-purchase background-check system when they return to Washington on Monday.
Before the one-week recess, lawmakers had expected to spend the next few weeks writing a spending bill and wrestling with immigration legislation. Now, the shooting that killed 17 people at a school in Parkland, Fla., on Feb. 14 and President Donald Trump’s calls to take action have returned the gun debate to the national spotlight.
...
